title: Handwritten script - anything close?
content:
Dear sirs,  
Do you know any script typeface close to this handwritten text?  
Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bild 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809183700/http:/typophile.com/files/Bild%201_8.jpg) | 48.93 KB |
author: Toby

comments.content:
[Emanuela](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809183700/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/trueblue/emanuela/?refby=bowfin) from TrueBlue looks similar to me, but thinner. Stroke could be added to make it bolder and more like your sample.

- Mike Yanega
